caption:
The photograph features a close-up image of a grasshopper resting on a wooden surface. The grasshopper dominates the frame, showcasing its detailed physical features such as its large, compound eyes, long antennae, and structured body segmented into head, thorax, and abdomen. The body displays a variety of colors including shades of yellow, green, and brown, which are perhaps adaptations for camouflage.

The texture and patterns on the grasshopperâ€™s body are quite intricate, with visible striping and speckles. The legs of the grasshopper, particularly the long hind ones, are designed for jumping and are also detailed in the image, emphasizing the muscular and jointed structures that provide functionality.

The wooden surface on which the grasshopper sits has a textured appearance with grains and ridges, illuminated by natural light that casts shadows and enhances the depth of the photograph. The background is blurred with tones of blue and dark areas, helping to focus attention primarily on the grasshopper and giving the photo a shallow depth of field.

Overall, the composition of the photograph emphasizes the grasshopper, using a macro perspective to bring forth the minute details and characteristics of this common but fascinating insect.
title: Grasshopper.  (from the sites exhibition.  For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 34, 35, 36, 37.)
